name: Stacey D. POWELL, Appellant v. EMIGRANT MORTGAGE COMPANY, INC., Appellee

judges: BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J., SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY and ORIE MELVIN, JJ.
parties: Stacey D. POWELL, Appellant v. EMIGRANT MORTGAGE COMPANY, INC., Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been IMPROVIDENTLY GRANTED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: James S. Tupitza, Esq., Tupitza & Bryman, P.C., West Chester, for Stacey D. Powell, appellant.
Blair H. Granger, Esq., Blair H. Granger & Associates, P.C., Paoli, for Emigrant Mortgage Company, Inc., appellee.
